content: HCA Coil anchor Economical coil anchor for temporary fastening in concrete (carbon steel, hex head) ### Categories: Home > Products > Fasteners > Mechanical anchors- - - ### FEATURES:Features Multiple-use design offers practical and cost-effective fastening solution Easily removable because only the coil remains in the hole Hex bolt head style for convenient installation with either SIW 22T-A/SIW 18T-A impact wrench or torque wrench Applications Fastening braces to support tilt-up and formwork Non-specified, temporary fastenings ### TECHNICAL DATA: Material, corrosion: Carbon steel, zinc-plated Head configuration: Hex head Base materials: Concrete (uncracked) Technical Data | Material, corrosion | Carbon steel, zinc-plated | Head configuration | Hex head | Base materials | Concrete (uncracked) | Type of fixing | Through-fastening | Reusable (and removable) | Yes | Cleaning procedures | Manual Cleaning | PROFIS Software | No | Installation direction | All | Material composition | Steel, zinc-plated (min. 5 Âµm) ### ITEMS- 252010 -
